## ThirdwebSDK.getApps() method

Call this to get the current apps.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getApps(): Promise<IAppModule[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IAppModule](./sdk.iappmodule.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

All currently registered apps for the connected wallet
